Summary Heading: Sad many poor families live here with their small children in one room. the picture that is posted on this website is not pictur
Summary: It is nice to see they have it as a sober living place and have meetings there in pool area. The patio furniture is quite run down and needs to be replaced. I sure hope they get some new furniture and someone puts some plants and flowers around the place to cheer it up instead of so run down looking

Summary Heading: Crappy area but overall quiet motel
Summary: Its a little outdated and Americana is written on everything including pillows..made me a little nervous.Pretty quiet considering families live there,right next to police station.sign out front says drug free alcohol free and I guess they hold NA meetings in pool area which was only used by sober living residents not daily guests.room was fairly clean old plumbing and ac but worked fine.staff very friendly and even though place is a bit rundown its noticable they do their best to keep it up and drama free.i would stay here again

The rooms were fine, very clean. Beds and pillows were good. The staff was nice. Pass on the pre-fabed breakfast of donuts, but the coffee was okay.  Rate was good versus other places especially when you are using it as a place to sleep after a trade show.
